shapes3d.utils
Class VectorUtil

java.lang.Object
  shapes3d.utils.VectorUtil

public class VectorUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used internally by the library and provides some additional methods not covered in the PVector class.

Author:
Peter Lager

orthogonal

public static processing.core.PVector orthogonal(processing.core.PVector v)

same

public static boolean same(processing.core.PVector v0,
                           float x,
                           float y,
                           float z)
Compares a PVector with a set of 3D coordinates. They are considered the same if the difference is less than 1e-5f for each value (x,y & z)

Parameters:
v0 -
x -
y -
z -
Returns:
true if the coordinates are the same

same

public static boolean same(processing.core.PVector v0,
                           processing.core.PVector v1)
Compares 2 PVectors. They are considered the same if the difference is less than 1e-5f for each attribute (x,y & z)

Parameters:
v0 -
v1 -
Returns:
true if the vectors are considered to be the same are the same

getCopy

public static processing.core.PVector getCopy(processing.core.PVector v)
Return a copy of the original vector. Effectively performs the action of the copy constructor missing from PVector.

Parameters:
v -
Returns:
a new PVector that is a copy
